subject: Order SSN5495
description_text: I have sent two other emails from amcdaniel@denhamservices.net regarding this same order . I do not have the ticket number because this email address is the only one I was able to log into here with. If you need me to explain the problem again I can if you can’t find other tickets associated with my order number

conversations.body_text: Hi adam mcdaniel,    We apologize for the delayed response—we've just returned from vacation. Here is your shipping tracking link. The product you purchased has been out of stock for nearly two weeks due to overwhelming demand. We will ship it to you within the next couple of days.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047209431506

Anything on this order? It was placed on the 30th and it still hasn’t shipped .

Thank you,
Adam McDaniel
(951)202-8616
________________________________
Hi adam mcdaniel,    Your package has been shipped and is expected to arrive around the 22nd.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047209431506
